name: Blades of Time (itch)
description:
Blades of Time is a side-scrolling 2d platformer where you play as a sword-slinging time traveler traversing a void-stricken landscape.  Use three swords to complete your mission; expertly use your uppercut, dash, and down-drop to defeat voidlings in an deteriorating city. 

This is a project created by a group of four game design students at Lawrence Technological University.
